# ğŸ¥· TypeJutsu

**TypeJutsu** is a powerful and fun Python command-line tool that **automatically types the text you recently copied** to your clipboard.

With one terminal command, it simulates real-time typing in any active window. You can even set a custom delay before it starts typing.

---

## âœ¨ Features

- ğŸ–±ï¸ Types the most recently copied text from your clipboard  
- ğŸ§  Simulates keystrokes in any active window using `pyautogui`  
- â³ Optional delay: control when typing begins (e.g., `typejutsu 3`)  
- âš¡ Simple terminal usage â€” just type `typejutsu` and go  
- ğŸ¯ Great for developers, content writers, automators, and pranksters ğŸ˜„
